0:
n = int(input())
    adj = [[] for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(n-1):
        a, b = map(int, input().split())
        adj[a-1].append(b-1)
        adj[b-1].append(a-1)
    v = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = [0]
    visited = [False]*n
    visited[0] = True
    while q:
        cur = q.pop(0)
        for i in adj[cur]:
            if not visited[i]:
                q.append(i)
                visited[i] = True
    q = [0]
    visited = [False]*n
    visited[0] = True
    ans = 0
    while q:
        cur = q.pop(0)
        for i in adj[cur]:
            if not visited[i]:
                q.append(i)
                visited[i] = True
                ans += abs(v[cur]-v[i])
                v[i] = v[cur]
    print(ans)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    code()

n = int(input())
    graph = [[] for i in range(n)]
    for i in range(n-1):
        a, b = map(int, input().split())
        graph[a-1].append(b-1)
        graph[b-1].append(a-1)
    v = list(map(int, input().split()))
    q = [0]
    visited = [False]*n
    visited[0] = True
    while q:
        cur = q.pop(0)
        for i in graph[cur]:
            if not visited[i]:
                q.append(i)
                visited[i] = True
    q = [0]
    visited = [False]*n
    visited[0] = True
    ans = 0
    while q:
        cur = q.pop(0)
        for i in graph[cur]:
            if not visited[i]:
                q.append(i)
                visited[i] = True
                ans += abs(v[cur]-v[i])
    print(ans)

if __name__ == "__main__":

13:
test_cases = int(input())
    for _ in range(test_cases):
        n, x = map(int, input().split())
        fav_nums = list(map(int, input().split()))
        hops = 0
        while x > 0:
            hops += 1
            x -= max(fav_nums)
        print(hops)

pairs.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
        cur, ans = float('-inf'), 0
        for x, y in pairs:
            if cur < x:
                cur = y
                ans += 1
        return ans
